message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.Distributed, cs.SE, cs.SC 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the architecture of a Grid system for scientific computing, which involves distributed computing. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is also likely as the paper mentions the establishment of an inter-Nordic testbed facility for wide area computing and data handling. 
- cs.Distributed (Distributed Computing) is another possible category as the paper discusses the components needed for a Grid system, which involves distributed computing. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is a possible category as the paper discusses the task flow and dynamics of the proposed architecture. 
- cs.SC (Scientific Computing) is also a possible category as the paper discusses the aim of the project to solve data intensive problems at the Large Hadron Collider at CERN.
